translation.en: Someone is calling you home...
'Cause it's another day For you and me in paradise
translation.es: A PRINCIPIOS DE LOS 90 DE CAMINO A LOS ÁNGELES

translation.en: - Hey, what's up? - Code.
translation.es: ROY HARDAWAY CÓMO SOBREVIVIR EN TINSELTOWN - ¿Sí? - Code.

translation.en: - Yeah? - It's good to hear your voice.
Holy shit. Lisa?
Are you okay? I haven't heard from you in months.
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? Hace meses no sé de ti.

translation.en: I was afraid you were dead.
I've been up in the woods working on that short film I told you about.
translation.es: He estado en el bosque, trabajando en el corto que te conté.

translation.en: Must have lost track of time.
Yeah. I know how you get. So you back in New York?
translation.es: Sí. Ya sé cómo te pones. ¿Ya estás en Nueva York?

translation.en: I'm an hour outside L.A.
translation.es: Estoy a una hora de L.A.

translation.en: Wait, what?
Do you know the name Lou Burke?
Lou Burke? Yeah, of course I do.
Apparently, he wants to meet with me.
Lis, that's huge.
Listen, I need a place to crash. Can I use your couch?
translation.es: Necesito dónde quedarme. ¿Puedo usar tu sofá?

translation.en: Are you kidding? Yeah, of course. Anything you need.
I'm at 4837 Traction, downtown.
translation.es: Estoy en Traction 4837, en el centro.

translation.en: I knew I could count on you.
- I'm glad you're not dead. - Me too. See you soon, Code.
translation.es: - Qué bueno que no estás muerta. - Sí. Te veo pronto, Code.

translation.en: I'm the one, natural one, make it easy
How's your band doing? - Heard you're selling drugs now, too. - Shh!
translation.es: ¿Cómo va tu banda? Escuché que ahora vendes drogas.

translation.en: Christine's asleep.
- Who the fuck is Christine? - My girlfriend. She lives here too.
translation.es: - ¿Quién es Christine? - Mi novia. También vive aquí.

translation.en: Your-- Is she gonna mind me being here?
No, no, no. I mean... - No, I'm sure it'll be fine. -
translation.es: No, no, no. Bueno... No, seguro que estará bien.

translation.en: I mean, you get along with everybody, right?
translation.es: Digo, te llevas bien con todos, ¿no?

translation.en: You said, you'd never come to L.A.
translation.es: Dijiste que nunca vendrías a Los Ángeles.

translation.en: Guess I changed my mind.
Your actress friend didn't wanna come?
Something happen in the woods?
You know. People tend to get fucked up around me.
translation.es: Ya sabes. La gente se pone mal cuando está cerca de mí.

translation.en: Not me.
You want this?
- Nah, I'm good. - Thank you.
- Night. - Goodnight.
- So you used to date my boyfriend. - I wouldn't say date exactly.
translation.es: - Entonces, salías con mi novio. - Yo no diría que salíamos.

translation.en: It looked like you were sleeping with your eyes open. It was gross.
translation.es: Parecía que dormías con los ojos abiertos. Fue asqueroso.

translation.en: Sorry.
So he said you might need to crash here for a minute or so,
translation.es: Me dijo que quizá necesites quedarte aquí un minuto o así,

translation.en: and I'm totally good with that if you do.
Just... If you wanna take a shower,
translation.es: Solo... si quieres darte un baño,

translation.en: use the hallway bathroom, not the one by our bedroom.
translation.es: usa el baño del pasillo, no el de nuestra habitación.

translation.en: And sometimes when you pull the thingy for the shower,
translation.es: Y a veces, cuando jalas la cosa de la ducha,

translation.en: seems like nothing's gonna happen, and then it goes, like, ca- chunk!
translation.es: parece que no pasa nada, y luego hace ¡chunc!

translation.en: And then... Pssh! Like, it spits right in your eye.
translation.es: Y luego... te escupe justo en el ojo.

translation.en: Are you, like, an actress or something?
Filmmaker.
Good for you.
It's a very tough town.
It takes years just to get a break.
What do you do?
I'm in real estate.
Morning.
- Hey, babe.  - Hey.
Get off your butt, Lis. Don't you have that meeting with Lou Burke?
translation.es: Levántate, Lis, ¿no tienes la entrevista con Lou Burke?

translation.en: Lou Burke?
Mr. Burke.
Lisa Nova.
Jesus, you're not much older than my son.
translation.es: Dios. No eres mucho mayor que mi hijo.

translation.en: Sit.
And call me Lou. Never Mr. Burke.
translation.es: Y llámame Lou. Nunca señor Burke.

translation.en: Okay. Lou. How'd you get my short film?
I sent it to a few people, but--
translation.es: Se lo envié a pocas personas...

translation.en: You know those nights you wake up every 20 minutes from a different dream?
translation.es: ¿Te ha pasado que te despiertas cada 20 minutos de un sueño diferente?

translation.en: My wife thinks I should see a sleep guy, but I love my dreams.
translation.es: Mi esposa dice que debo ir al médico, pero amo mis sueños.

translation.en: I dream about the birds. Oh, hello. Thank you.
Falcons, actually.
I raise Arctic Peregrines. Like nature's 200- mile- an- hour missile.
translation.es: Crío halcones peregrinos. Un misil natural que va a 322 kilómetros por hora.

translation.en: I had three, but one killed Glenn Close's Pekingese,
translation.es: Tenía tres, pero uno mató al perro de Glenn Close,

translation.en: and now I've got two. Thank you.
You're having coffee with sushi.
I drink this coffee with everything. Comayagua!
Ship it in from Honduras.
My assistant makes sure my favorite spots have it on hand.
translation.es: Mi asistente ve que lo tengan en mis restaurantes favoritos.

translation.en: - Very cool. So-- - What's your story?
Not from L.A., I take it.
translation.es: No eres de L.A., es claro.

translation.en: No, I'm from Brazil, actually.
translation.es: No, en realidad soy de Brasil.

translation.en: My father is a botanist. He was looking for corpse vines--
translation.es: Mi padre es botánico. Fue a buscar vides...

translation.en: I feel like you're flicking puzzle pieces at me.
translation.es: Siento que solo me muestras piezas de rompecabezas.

translation.en: - He was looking for a corpse vine? - What are we doing here?
I wanted to meet you.
That's how meetings work.
Japanese scallops.
I saw a tape sitting on a desk and...
translation.es: Vi una cinta sobre un escritorio, y...

translation.en: I don't know. I had this voice in my head.
translation.es: No sé. Escuché una voz en mi cabeza.

translation.en: Pick up this video tape.
Pick it up.
It's a true story.
That sound crazy? Probably does.
So you liked my movie.
So, what do we got?
It's tense.
And scary.
And, um...
My God, that ending.
I mean, those special effects when she...
Well, I don't wanna get too gory over lunch.
translation.es: Bueno, no quiero ponerme muy gore mientras comemos.

translation.en: So the question is what's the full- length,
translation.es: La pregunta es, ¿cómo es la versión completa,

translation.en: major- motion- picture, opens- on- 1500- screens- nationwide version?
translation.es: el gran largometraje que se estrena en 1500 pantallas a nivel nacional?

translation.en: Well, what it's really about, to me, is...
translation.es: Bueno, de lo que se trata, para mí, es...

translation.en: this woman.
She's got this thing. But she doesn't know how to use it yet.
translation.es: Tiene esta cosa. Pero aún no sabe cómo usarla.

translation.en: Like a superpower. Right? Her eyes already do that thing.
translation.es: Como un superpoder, ¿no? Sus ojos ya hacen eso...

translation.en: Yeah, but other people wanna take it from her.
They wanna suck her dry and don't care if they kill her in the process.
translation.es: Quieren quitárselo, y no les importa matarla en el proceso.

translation.en: So this woman, she has to learn how to use this thing against them.
translation.es: Entonces, esta mujer, debe aprender a usar esta cosa en contra de ellos.

translation.en: If she wants to make it out alive.
- Okay. - It's a paranoid thriller.
Woman on the run. Right? I've been looking for something like this.
translation.es: Una mujer que huye, ¿cierto? He estado buscando algo así.

translation.en: Okay, so let's do a director wish list. Right?
translation.es: Bueno, hagamos una lista de deseos de directores.

translation.en: I'm directing.
Okay.
I mean, a rookie director is a tough sell.
translation.es: Es que un director novato es difícil de vender.

translation.en: You'd have to sell yourself as a...
young female Cronenberg, uh...
Verhoeven.
Truth is, I've been looking to take more chances.
translation.es: La verdad, he estado buscando más riesgos.

translation.en: You know, maybe you're the chance I've been looking to take.
translation.es: Quizá tú eres ese riesgo que he estado buscando.

translation.en: But you need to learn to persuade people that you're the one to make this.
translation.es: Pero necesitas aprender a convencer a todos de que tú lo harás.

translation.en: So you'll help me out.
That's great.
And that's the thing.
Not everything can be taught. Some things have to be experienced...
translation.es: No todo puede enseñarse. Algunas cosas deben experimentarse...

translation.en: Holy fucking shit. Roy Hardaway?
Is that Roy- fucking- Hardaway? Oh, my God! It is!
translation.es: ¿Es el maldito Roy Hardaway? ¡Por Dios, es él!

translation.en: - How's it going, Lou? Good to see you. - How the fuck are ya, huh?
translation.es: - ¿Cómo vas, Lou? Qué gusto. - ¿Cómo carajos estás?

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, Roy, this is Lisa Nova. Lisa Nova, Roy Hardaway.
translation.es: Sí. Roy, ella es Lisa Nova. Lisa Nova, Roy Hardaway.

translation.en: The actor.
I know who he is. Hi.
You gotta try the monkfish liver. It's next- level.
translation.es: Tienes que probar el hígado de rape. Otro nivel.

translation.en: It's mind blowing, like having a woman undress in your mouth.
translation.es: Te vuela los sesos, como una mujer desvistiéndose en tu boca.

translation.en: Am I gonna see you at the Alvin Sender...?
Not sure yet. I haven't decided.
translation.es: Aún no lo sé. No he decidido.

translation.en: - It was nice to meet you, Lisa. - Yes. You too.
So I'm assuming this is you?
translation.es: Asumo que este es tu auto.

translation.en: Yes, that's me.
- You living out of this thing? - Actually, yes, I am.
translation.es: - ¿Vives en esta cosa? - De hecho, sí, aquí vivo.

translation.en: Jesus.
Home sweet home.
Tell you what.
I'm gonna option your short.
We'll make the feature just the way you want it.
translation.es: Haremos la película, tal como tú quieres.

translation.en: Consider this a deposit.
I'll send over a contract. Have a lawyer look it over.
translation.es: Te enviaré el contrato para que tu abogado lo revise.

translation.en: Okay.
- - Consider an apartment.
Why?
Do you want?
Oh, no, thank you. I'm not hungry, but thanks.
translation.es: No, gracias. No tengo hambre, pero gracias.

translation.en: When the bandages come off, she'll look like Daryl Hannah.
translation.es: Cuando se quite las vendas, se parecerá a Daryl Hannah.

translation.en: Cher wasn't built in a day.
translation.es: Cher no se hizo en un día.

translation.en: So is it legit?
Nothing seems shady.
You should get a lawyer.
I can't afford one.
Jules says it looks legit.
translation.es: Jules dice que se ve bien.

translation.en: Well, if Jules Brandenberg says so.
translation.es: Bueno, si Jules Brandenberg lo dice.

translation.en: I know what a contract looks like. I have a movie in development.
translation.es: Sé cómo son los contratos. Tengo una película en proceso.

translation.en: - He directed our video, babe. - Meaningless.
You're gonna be huge, baby.
Thank you.
Lou Burke. Wow.
He hasn't had a hit in a few years, but I love Breaking Point.
translation.es: No ha tenido un éxito en años, pero amo Breaking Point.

translation.en: Good for you.
Thanks. So does the contract protect me as the director?
translation.es: Gracias. ¿El contrato me protege como directora?

translation.en: Can I be fired?
No producer hires a director they can't replace if the director sucks.
translation.es: Ningún productor contrata un director que no pueda reemplazar si apesta.

translation.en: In theory, they could fire Steven Spielberg if they want to.
translation.es: Podrían correr a Steven Spielberg, si quisieran.

translation.en: But, yeah,
this says, you, Lisa Natasha Nova, are directing the movie.
translation.es: aquí dice que tú, Lisa Natasha Nova, dirigirás la película.

translation.en: Just don't suck.
You think I could meet him?
It's kind of a shithole, but you can't afford anything that isn't.
translation.es: Es una pocilga, pero no te alcanza para algo mejor.

translation.en: The great news is it's furnished.
translation.es: Lo bueno es que está amueblado.

translation.en: Or someone abandoned the furniture in here.
translation.es: O alguien abandonó aquí sus muebles.

translation.en: But either way, you can use it.
Drifting in a day not yet begun♪
translation.es: BASADA EN UNA HISTORIA REAL NIÑA ASESINA A CHICOS

translation.en: I love this place.
Careful at night. There's coyotes all around here.
translation.es: Cuidado en la noche. Por aquí hay coyotes.

translation.en: - There's whats? - Coyotes.
They're fucking dangerous.
Feels kinda haunted.
Maybe you'll hear some silent film actress sobbing all night.
translation.es: Quizá escuches a una actriz del cine mudo llorando por la noche.

translation.en: Maybe she slit her wrists in the clawfoot tub.
translation.es: Quizá se cortó las venas en la bañera.

translation.en: Not a clawfoot.
I always wanted a penthouse.
The top floor of a walkup is not a penthouse.
translation.es: El último piso de las escaleras no es un penthouse.

translation.en: Coyotes.
Coyotes.
So let's talk about Lisa Nova.
Can you sell me Lisa Nova?
You mean sell my movie idea?
No, actually, I don't. Everybody's got an idea.
translation.es: No. De hecho, no. Todos tienen una idea.

translation.en: There's only one you.
So who are you?
Sell yourself to me.
Okay.
So, I'm sure you hear this all the time, but I'm not like every other director.
translation.es: Seguro siempre escucha esto, pero no soy como los demás directores.

translation.en: Oh, you're not?
I witness a murder. Right?
I saw the guy. Got a good look at him. Now all the cops are standing around,
translation.es: Vi al tipo. Lo vi bien. Ahora los policías están alrededor,

translation.en: the sketch artist has her pad and her pencils,
translation.es: la artista de retrato tiene su libreta y lápices.

translation.en: and everyone's waiting with bated breath and I say,
translation.es: Todos están esperando sin aliento, y digo:

translation.en: The killer was not like a jellyfish.
translation.es: El asesino no era como una medusa.

translation.en: - Don't tell me what you're not. - Copy that.
translation.es: - No me digas lo que no eres. - Entiendo.

translation.en: Don't worry, you're still young. We'll keep going until we get it right.
translation.es: No te preocupes, aún eres joven. Seguiremos hasta que lo hagamos bien.

translation.en: Even the air in here has jelled
- You okay? You look tired. - I didn't get much sleep.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien? Pareces cansada. - No dormí bien.

translation.en: Go again. Go.
I grew up loving movies.
When I was a kid, in São Conrado, my dad had a projector,
translation.es: Cuando era niña, en São Conrado, mi papá tenía un proyector,

translation.en: - and I used to watch-- - Let me tell you about a guy.
translation.es: - y yo veía... - Te hablaré de un hombre.

translation.en: His name's Alvin Sender, and he's rich as sin.
translation.es: Se llama Alvin Sender, y es millonario.

translation.en: What makes him unique is he loves finding new talent.
translation.es: Lo que lo hace único es que ama buscar talento nuevo.

translation.en: You know the Sex, Lies, and Videotape kid? Alvin's financing his next project.
translation.es: ¿Conoces al de Sexo, mentiras y video? Alvin financiará su nuevo proyecto.

translation.en: Problem is a lot of people ask Alvin for money.
translation.es: El problema es que muchos le piden dinero a Alvin.

translation.en: And believe me when I tell you, they all grew up loving movies.
translation.es: Y créeme, todos crecieron amando las películas.

translation.en: So, what makes you different?
translation.es: Así que dime, ¿qué te hace diferente?

translation.en: Maybe I'm just not good at this whole pitching myself thing.
translation.es: Quizá no soy buena para esto de venderme a mí misma.

translation.en: When I was a kid, I was in a really bad accident.
translation.es: Cuando era niño, tuve un terrible accidente.

translation.en: Stuck in a bed for the better part of a year.
translation.es: Estuve en cama casi todo un año.

translation.en: Worst part, I couldn't go to the movies.
translation.es: Lo peor fue que no podía ir al cine.

translation.en: And a movie theater was my church, it was everything to me.
translation.es: E ir al cine era como ir a la iglesia. Para mí, lo era todo.

translation.en: So I'd have to imagine the movies I wanted to see, beginning to end.
translation.es: Así que tenía que imaginarme las películas que quería ver, de principio a fin.

translation.en: But to this day, I firmly believe
translation.es: Pero al día de hoy, creo firmemente

translation.en: that accident is the only reason I have three Oscars to polish.
translation.es: que ese accidente es la única razón por la que tengo tres Oscars que pulir.

translation.en: Because I had a North Star.
Would that kid in that hospital bed wanna see this movie?
translation.es: ¿Ese niño hospitalizado querría ver esta película?

translation.en: That kid was my audience.
Who's yours?
Let's go for a drive.
What are you thinking about?
My mom.
What about her?
You asked who my audience is.
translation.es: Me preguntó quién es mi público.

translation.en: She must be an interesting lady.
translation.es: Debe de ser una mujer muy interesante.

translation.en: I wouldn't know.
Never met her.
She left right after I was born.
I know what I'm about to say is gonna sound crazy.
translation.es: Sé que lo que voy a decir parecerá una locura.

translation.en: Actually never said it out loud before but...
translation.es: De hecho, nunca lo he dicho en voz alta, pero...

translation.en: I feel like if I can make my film,
translation.es: ...siento que si puedo hacer mi película,

translation.en: somehow, she'll see it.
translation.es: de algún modo, ella la verá.

translation.en: And she'll know it came from me.
translation.es: Y sabrá que yo la hice.

translation.en: That's beautiful.
You know, I could walk this into a studio a lot easier without you,
translation.es: Yo podría llevar esto a un estudio, y sería más fácil sin ti,

translation.en: or take it to Alvin with some hotshot music video director,
translation.es: o llevárselo a Alvin con algún director popular de videos musicales,

translation.en: but it's about relevance.
You know?
You only get so many bites at the apple.
translation.es: Hay un número limitado de oportunidades.

translation.en: A year in this business is like a decade, and I haven't...
translation.es: Un año en este negocio es como una década, y yo no...

translation.en: I haven't had a real hit since 1986.
translation.es: No he tenido ningún éxito desde 1986.

translation.en: I don't wanna know what it's like to disappear.
translation.es: No quiero saber cómo es desaparecer.

translation.en: I need you.
That's the truth.
So Saturday night, Alvin Sender's having a thing at his gallery.
translation.es: El sábado por la noche, Alvin Sender dará un evento en su galería.

translation.en: Movie people, movie stars.
translation.es: Gente del cine. Estrellas de cine.

translation.en: Be a great opportunity to meet Alvin.
translation.es: Es una gran oportunidad para ver a Alvin.

translation.en: It's a date.
Well, this should be fun.
We're going as a team.
I'll build you up, get Alvin on your side.
translation.es: Yo te echaré flores, y pondré a Alvin de tu lado.

translation.en: And then when you have the official meeting,
he'll know who you are. Right?
And then when you walk out of that meeting, you'll have a movie.
translation.es: Y cuando salgas de esa reunión, tendrás una película.

translation.en: Thanks.
Whatever happens, thanks for everything.
translation.es: Pase lo que pase, gracias por todo.

translation.en: My pleasure.
I think we make a good team.
translation.es: Creo que somos un buen equipo.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I thought, um...
I'm sorry.
I think we make a good team too.
translation.es: Yo también creo que somos un buen equipo.

translation.en: What's Alvin Sender look like?
Like a rich guy.
You know, the masks read your brain waves and turn them into these little movies.
translation.es: Las máscaras miden sus ondas cerebrales, y las convierten en pequeños videos.

translation.en: Stay here and look cool.
Bruce! Where the fuck did you get those cigarettes?
Lisa Nova.
Here you are.
This thing creeps me out.
I know it's bullshit, but I don't want the world to have a window into my mind.
translation.es: Sé que es mentira, pero no quiero que el mundo vea lo que tengo en la mente.

translation.en: I love it.
What would somebody see if they looked through your window?
translation.es: ¿Qué vería el mundo si se asomaran a tu mente?

translation.en: I guess it depends on who's looking.
translation.es: Supongo que depende de quién mire.

translation.en: You know that woman?
She's been watching you since you've walked in.
translation.es: Ha estado mirándote desde que llegaste.

translation.en: She's probably trying to figure out where you are in the food chain.
translation.es: Quizá quiere saber en qué parte de la cadena alimenticia estás.

translation.en: See you around, maybe.
I've been waiting for the right moment to say hello.
translation.es: Estaba esperando el momento oportuno para saludarte.

translation.en: Do you know me?
The man you came in with is having a very important conversation without you.
translation.es: El hombre con el que llegaste está en una conversación importante sin ti.

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Boro.
What do you want?
To offer my services.
What is it you do?
For you? I could hurt someone.
How?
Will you hold my cat?
- Uh... - Here. Aww....
Okay, baby.
Sometimes, I imagine I'm inside him like he's a house.
translation.es: A veces me imagino dentro de él, como si fuera una casa.

translation.en: You could do that.
Imagine you're inside someone. Say, the man you came here with.
translation.es: Imagínate dentro de alguien. Como el hombre con el que viniste.

translation.en: - Inside of him? - Yes.
Imagine that.
Like he's a house and you're wandering around.
translation.es: Como si él fuera una casa, y tú estuvieras caminando por ahí.

translation.en: Are you doing it?
Yeah.
No. No, you're not.
Okay.
Imagine...
that you're inside him.
You feel it?
Now, break something.
Done.
- - Oh, yes. I know.
I know.
Here.
I'm at Cortez and Maribel in Boyle Heights.
translation.es: Estoy en Cortez y Maribel en Boyle Heights.

translation.en: Come find me. There's no number,
translation.es: Ven a verme. No hay número,

translation.en: but you'll know it by the white jaguar out front.
translation.es: pero sabrás dónde es por el jaguar blanco afuera.

translation.en: Bring my cat.
You just took it.
I found Alvin.
Taking a piss next to me, can you believe it?
The john, man.
Brings everybody together.
- What happened? - Mm.
Craziest thing. We're talking,
and all of a sudden, my nose starts gushing blood,
translation.es: y de pronto, mi nariz empezó a derramar sangre a chorros.

translation.en: like a faucet.
And I haven't done blow since like '85.
translation.es: Y no he inhalado cocaína desde 1985.

translation.en: I promised my wife. Thank you.
translation.es: Se lo prometí a mi esposa. Gracias.

translation.en: So, where is Alvin now?
Oh, he left. He was on his way out.
translation.es: Se fue. Ya iba de salida.

translation.en: Oh, shit, he left. I didn't even get to--
Lisa, relax.
I talked to him.
He's in.
What, just now? In the bathroom? Without watching the short?
My word's good for him.
Told you we make a great team.
translation.es: Te lo dije. Somos un gran equipo.

translation.en: And he knows I'm directing?
Lisa, Jesus!
What do you do when you get bad news?
translation.es: ¿Qué haces cuando te dan malas noticias?

translation.en: It's good.
He's in, I talked to him.
You're welcome.
Why are we stopping?
I think your mother's gonna be proud of you.
translation.es: Creo que tu madre estará orgullosa de ti.

translation.en: What?
Nice.
Push in, push in, push in...
Cut.
Get off!
What? What's the problem?
Misread.
You coming?
Like to walk. Okay. All right.
translation.es: Te gusta caminar. Bien. Muy bien.

translation.en: Enjoy the view.
Hi.
Bring my cat.
Now, break something.
I could hurt someone.
What the fuck!
Code!
Jesus fucking Christ, you're like a fucking serial killer.
translation.es: Por Dios, eres como un asesino serial.

translation.en: I knocked. You didn't hear me? Your door was open.
translation.es: Toqué. ¿No me escuchaste? La puerta estaba abierta.

translation.en: I just-- I wanted to see how you were doing with this whole...
translation.es: Solo... quería saber cómo estabas con todo esto de...

translation.en: Jules Brandenberg thing.
What Jules Brandenberg thing?
I mean, even he feels weird about it.
translation.es: Bueno, hasta él se siente raro.

translation.en: What's he feel weird about?
Meeting with Lou.
What's he meeting with Lou for?
translation.es: ¿Por qué va a ver a Lou?

translation.en: To direct your movie.
I thought you knew.
- He's expecting me. -
Excuse me! Who are you?
Lisa.
Meet my son, Jonathan, the artist. He's taking a semester off.
translation.es: Él es mi hijo, Jonathan, el artista. Se tomó un semestre libre.

translation.en: Uh... And this is my falcon, Maverick.
translation.es: Y él es mi halcón, Maverick.

translation.en: Do not mess with this guy. Look at that face.
translation.es: No te metas con él. Mira esa cara.

translation.en: No sense of humor.
Can we talk in private?
Yeah.
Why am I hearing that Jules Brandenberg is up to direct my film?
translation.es: ¿Por qué dicen que Jules Brandenberg dirigirá mi película?

translation.en: Hey! I direct!
- We talked about this! - You know precocial animals?
- What the fuck? - Giraffes are an example.
Right after they're born, they stand up.
translation.es: En cuanto nacen, se ponen de pie.

translation.en: Covered in placenta and everything. They're all wet and wobbly.
translation.es: Cubiertas en placenta y todo. Empapadas e inestables.

translation.en: They don't know what walking is,
but they're trying so damn hard to do it anyway.
translation.es: pero igual se esfuerzan por hacerlo.

translation.en: I'm not gonna give you the rights to my film if I'm not directing it.
translation.es: No te daré los derechos de mi película si no la dirijo yo.

translation.en: Do you know what you signed?
No.
You don't know what you signed.
translation.es: No sabes qué fue lo que firmaste.

translation.en: Learn to walk before you try to run.
translation.es: Aprende a caminar antes de intentar correr.

translation.en: You know? Remember, this is still a very big deal for you.
translation.es: Recuerda que esto aún es genial para ti.

translation.en: We had an agreement.
We do have one. We signed it.
Lou.
Sometimes, you want a filet mignon, and you get a Dodger Dog instead.
translation.es: A veces quieres un filete miñón, pero te dan un perro caliente.

translation.en: But Dodger Dogs are delicious.
translation.es: Pero los perros calientes son deliciosos.

translation.en: You made a promise.
I did make you a promise. And we do have an agreement.
translation.es: Sí te hice una promesa. Y sí tenemos un acuerdo.

translation.en: Have a seat.
Okay.
This business, this banquet
we're all feeding our bellies at,
translation.es: en el que todos estamos llenándonos,

translation.en: it's made up of promises and agreements.
translation.es: está hecho de promesas y acuerdos.

translation.en: The problem is, you're still learning the difference between them.
translation.es: El problema es que estás aprendiendo la diferencia entre esas dos cosas.

translation.en: And a promise is an hors d'oeuvre.
translation.es: Y las promesas son un hors d'oeuvre.

translation.en: You know, it's an appetizer that gets passed around.
translation.es: Ya sabes, un aperitivo que se ofrece.

translation.en: Bacon wrapped date? Thank you, I'd love one.
translation.es: ¿Dátil envuelto en tocino? Gracias. Tomaré uno.

translation.en: Then we sit down for the main course. The meat.
translation.es: Luego nos sentamos para el platillo principal. La carne.

translation.en: That's the agreement.
And you...
ate it.
What changed?
I'm not the bad guy.
I know you want me to be. I understand that.
translation.es: Sé que quieres que lo sea. Entiendo.

translation.en: But this world we live in is predators and prey.
translation.es: Pero este mundo en el que vivimos es de cazadores y presas.

translation.en: And each and every one of us is both.
Say it.
I gotta hear you say it.
What changed?
All right. And you're an artist, right? So it's all material. Use it.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Eres una artista, ¿sí? Todo es material. Lo usamos.

translation.en: Maybe this is news to you, but art is violent, man.
translation.es: Quizá esto sea novedad para ti, pero el arte es violento.

translation.en: It's selfish. I mean, I-- I thought you knew that.
translation.es: Es egoísta. Pensé que lo sabías.

translation.en: Written and directed by Lisa Nova.
translation.es: Escrita y dirigida por Lisa Nova.

translation.en: Are you gonna tell me you've never used anybody
translation.es: ¿Vas a decirme que nunca has usado a nadie

translation.en: for the sake of making something?
That there's nobody out there who'd say, Lisa Nova is selfish?
translation.es: ¿Que no hay alguien que diría: Lisa Nova es egoísta?

translation.en: I wanna hear you say it.
What are you punishing me for?
I think we've said enough.
Is that your wife out there?
translation.es: ¿La que está ahí es tu esposa?

translation.en: What's-- ? What's her name? I could talk to her.
translation.es: ¿Cómo...? ¿Cómo se llama? Podría hablar con ella.

translation.en: Oh, you don't want me to talk to your wife.
translation.es: No quieres que hable con tu esposa.

translation.en: Think.
Very carefully.
Let this be a learning experience.
translation.es: Deja que esta sea una experiencia de aprendizaje.

translation.en: You're gonna regret it.
Lisa?
Rewind!
I can't have you leaving here all upset.
I feel like I left the campsite in worse shape than I found it,
translation.es: Siento que dejo el campamento peor de como lo encontré,

translation.en: which is a major Boy Scout no- no.
translation.es: y los Boy Scouts no hacemos eso.

translation.en: What?
Look, there is a reality where you have a very long career.
translation.es: Mira, hay una realidad en la que tienes una carrera muy larga.

translation.en: Okay, but one of the skills you're going to need...
translation.es: Pero una de las habilidades que necesitarás...

translation.en: is the ability to apologize.
You want me to apologize to you?
You just came into my home uninvited.
translation.es: Acabas de entrar a mi casa, sin invitación.

translation.en: And you threatened me.
You can't even admit you took my movie,
translation.es: No admites que robaste mi película,

translation.en: because you're a fucking washed- up fucking--
What did you say?
What am I? Say it again. Say it again.
You know what you are?
You're a fucking nothing. You're a million fucking wannabes.
translation.es: Una maldita nada. Eres un millón de jodidos imitadores.

translation.en: I see it every fucking day.
Bet your mother saw the same thing in you.
translation.es: Seguro que tu madre también lo vio.

translation.en: Just a meaningless fucking void!
Get the fuck out of my driveway before I call the cops.
translation.es: Lárgate de mi entrada antes de que llame a la policía.

translation.en: You said you could hurt someone for me.
translation.es: Dijiste que lastimarías a alguien por mí.

translation.en: Is that true?
Where's my cat?
I didn't bring your cat.
Can you help me?
What did he do to you?
He betrayed me.
So what? It happens.
No.
He took the only thing I care about.
translation.es: Se llevó lo único que me importa.

translation.en: So...
Whatever it is you do,
I want you to do it.
To him.
As long as you can pay my rate.
I'll pay you whatever you want.
Great.
I'll take the first payment upfront.
translation.es: El primer pago es por adelantado.

translation.en: Do you know how special you are?
Do you?
You have something inside you.
It's tasty.
It's always been there.
Your stuff, your substance.
It's the beginning of all of your thoughts.
translation.es: Es el inicio de todos tus pensamientos.

translation.en: And it wants to be born.
You can keep the other cat.
Do we have a deal?
Say what you want.
Say it.
I want my movie back.
And I want to set his life on fire.
translation.es: Y quiero que su vida sea un infierno.

translation.en: - - We can do that.
